pages.text: Beverage Vending Machine is for selling or distributing drinks as well as other fluids. It accepts a preset number of asses to dispense a portion(250mb) of fluid.

Only owner can check out the gui of Beverage Vending Machine, others should held enough asses and right click to make it active, and then click with a fluid container to fill it with fluid provided by the machine.
Owner can set price of fluid, retrive asses as well as restock fluids.
